profile:
Proudly serving Calgary & area, Homeworks Restorationâ€™s team has over 100 years combined experience in the restoration industry, our well trained and professional staff are equipped and prepared for any restoration project. We have seen it all from working on small fire restoration to full warehouse recovery.

Homeworks has the experience of working with both insurers and homeowners to navigate a claim and restore a property to pristine condition. Our 24/7 response team is sure to quickly adhere to all emergency situations.

At Homeworks our priority is always customer satisfaction, and we accomplish this one restoration project at a time.

At Homeworks our priority is always customer satisfaction, and we accomplish this one restoration project at a time by ensuring:

- We stay on top of your restoration project from initial estimate to completion
- We set and achieve solid & realistic deadlines
- We prepare & protect your home or business from the start and during the whole process.
- We clean the job site daily and leave your property organized and proper.
- We honestly & accurately price each job to prevent any hidden costs or shortcuts
- We keep constant communication to avoid surprises
